fn.p: Author Contributions K.K. designed research and performed the fieldwork and collected samples; T.M., K.K. and R.S. performed the organic geochemistry. M.F., K.K. and R.S. conducted isotope measurements. K.K. calculated the amount of soot ejected. N.O., K.A. and Y.A. conducted climate model calculation, after discussing with K.K. K.K. interpreted the data and wrote the paper. N.O. wrote the methods and results of the model calculation and produced the Figures of the model calculation.
